label: ball
caption: A playful black dog is seen leaping from the top of a large, weathered hay bale in a rustic field, its paws splayed out to the sides as it attempts to catch a red rubber ball that has just been tossed into the air by an unseen person off-camera. The sun casts long shadows across the lush green grass as the dog's joyful energy is palpable amidst the serene countryside backdrop. In the distance, a few wispy clouds drift lazily across a bright blue sky, adding to the carefree atmosphere of the scene.
